title: Force Plot Is not Displayed
body:
Hey there I'm totally new into programming with python. Doing it for my thesis. I managed to learn a lot by reading all your issues but right now I'm a little desperate. 

The following: 

x_train, x_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(x, y, test_size = 0.3 , random_state=42)

dtrain = lgb.Dataset(x_train, y_train, free_raw_data=False, silent=True)
lgb_params = {
        'objective': 'binary',
        'boosting_type': 'rf',
        'subsample': 0.623,
        'colsample_bytree': 0.7,
        'num_leaves': 127,
        'max_depth': 8,
        'seed': None,
        'bagging_freq': 1,
        'n_jobs': 4
    }

explainer = shap.TreeExplainer(clf)
shap_values = explainer.shap_values(x_train)
print(shap_values)
shap.summary_plot(shap_values, x_train) 
shap.summary_plot(shap_values[1], x_train)
shap.force_plot(explainer.expected_value [1],shap_values[1][1,:],x_train.iloc[1,:])
shap.force_plot(explainer.expected_value[1],shap_values[1][:1000,:],x_train.iloc[:1000,:])

I get beautiful outputs for the summary plots. But the forceplot doesn't show up. If i add plt.savefigure and plt.show a blank plot is shown and saved. No error is reported. The program just finishes. I tried mathplotlib = true and it worked partly for the single force plot. 
How can i get the plot shown?
I tried shap.inijs , plt.show, display etc pp nothing worked

Thanks for helping
